questions.text: Who was hanging from the TV in the cold opening?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

Norm.

questions.text: When Sam asked Diane not to audition what did Diane think?
questions.correct: He was in love with her.
questions.explanation:
He was in love with her.

	Diane was still waiting to marry Sam, so anything he did that was remotely nice made her think he was in love with her. Sam was actually just being a good friend...or maybe not...maybe Diane was right and we just don't see that as of this episode.
